body:
Comment 4 by **elia@schito.me**: 
I'll add a couple of notes:

- watching huge directories results in "too many open files"
- Listen (https://github.com/guard/listen#readme) tackles the same problem and has been
there for a while, if there's a common ground between the various implementation I bet
they got it.
- maybe it's worth exposing the single adapters for ppl to dig deeper while keeping a
surface API for the stuff that's common between them

For the record my use-case regards watching some folders and know if anything changed
inside them, but not caring for the single files.
